short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notifier for Gmail, Hotmail, Yahoo, AOL and so on

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Notifier for Gmail, Hotmail, Yahoo, AOL and so on

X-notifier checks your webmail accounts and notifies the number of unread emails.
Notification is not confined to webmails.
You can also get notification for over one hundred sites including Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc by installing scripts.
You can get scripts from http://xnotifier.tobwithu.com/scripts.php

Features
- mail notification
- support userscript for other webmails
- support multiple Google Accounts
- account switching
- auto login
- ....... and so on
long.ko:
Notifier for Gmail, Hotmail, Yahoo, AOL and so on

X-notifier checks your webmail accounts and notifies the number of unread emails.
Notification is not confined to webmails.
You can also get notification for Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc by installing scripts.

Features
- mail notification (Gmail, Hotmail, Yahoo, AOL, Daum, Naver, Nate)
- support userscript for other webmails
- support multiple Google Accounts
- account switching
- auto login
- ....... and so on
